targets.rawSql:
SELECT a.nombre::Text "CODIGO CASO",
    	e.cedula::Text "CEDULA",
    	e.nombre::TEXT "DENUNCIANTE",
    	e.telefono::Text "TELEFONO",
    	b.nombre::Text "ESTADO",
    	c.nombre::Text "MUNICIPIO",
    	d.nombre::Text "PARROQ",
    	a.direccion::Text "DIR",
    	a.descripcion::TEXT "DESCRIP", 
	  	f.name::Text "CATEGORIA",
	  	g.name::Text "SUBCATEG",
	  	case when m.name is null then 'Sin ExtCateg' else m.name end::Text "EXTCATEG", 
		i.nombre::Text "ESTATUS",
		to_char(a.fecha, 'dd-mm-YY  hh:mm:ss')::Text "FECHA",
		--to_char(h.fecha_registro,'dd-mm-YY hh:mm:ss') as "FECHA ESTATUS",
       case when k.nombre is null then 'Analizando' else k.nombre end::Text "INSTITUCION",
		k.nombre::Text "RESPONSABLE"
        FROM gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
            inner join gestion.parroquia d on d.id = a.id_parroquia
            inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
            inner join gestion.category f on f.id = a.id_categoria
            inner join gestion.category g on g.id = a.id_sub_categoria
            left JOIN  gestion.category m ON m.id = a.id_extra_categoria
            inner JOIN  gestion.estatus i ON a.id_estatus = i.id            
            inner JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id
            inner JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio
      where  j.id_resolutorio in (503)
      and j.principal is true
      and a.id_estatus in (3,4,8)

panels.title: LISTADO DE CASOS  DE LA BASE DE DATOS
LISTADO DE CASOS  DE PDVSA GAS EN LA BASE DE DATOS

targets.rawSql:
select b.nombre::Text "ESTADOS",
sum(CASE WHEN a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,8) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "RECIBIDO",
sum(CASE WHEN a.id_estatus in (3) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "ASIGNADO",
sum(CASE WHEN a.id_estatus in (4,8) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "EN PROCESO",
sum(CASE WHEN a.id_estatus in (6) AND ((a.feedback < 2 and a.verificado is null) or (a.feedback is null and a.verificado is null)) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "POR CONFIRMAR",
sum(CASE WHEN a.id_estatus in (6) AND (a.feedback >= 2 or a.verificado = 'SI') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "ATENDIDO", --, count(a.id) as "TOTAL"
trunc(sum(CASE WHEN a.id_estatus in (6) and z.id_tipo_resolutorio in (4) and  e.id_resolutorio in (503) AND (a.feedback >= 2 or a.verificado = 'SI')
THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)::decimal*100/count(*)::decimal,2) AS "% EFECTIVIDAD %"
from gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.category c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
inner join gestion.responsable e on e.id_caso =  a.id
inner join gestion.resolutorio z on z.id =  e.id_resolutorio
inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
where a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,8)
and z.id_tipo_resolutorio in (4) 
and b.id < 25 and  e.id_resolutorio in (503)
and e.principal is true --and z.nombre in ($gobernaciones)
group by b.nombre
HAVING count(*) > 1
order by "% EFECTIVIDAD %" desc

SELECT count(a.id)
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id 
where b.id_resolutorio in (503) 
and b.principal is true
and a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,8)

SELECT count(a.id)
	  FROM gestion.caso a
    inner join gestion.category c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
    where a.id_sub_categoria in (4)
    and a.id_estatus in (5)

-- Casos Recibidos
 SELECT count(a.id)
	  FROM gestion.caso a
    inner join gestion.category c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria 
    where a.id_sub_categoria in (4)
    and a.id_estatus in (15)

-- Casos Cerrados
 select 
          ec.tx_nom_edo_caso::Text estatus,
          d.tx_nom_sub_categoria::Text servicio,
          count(c.id_caso)::Text subtotal,
          (select count(*) from caso where id_edo_caso in (7))::Text Total
        from 
            caso c 
            inner join edo_caso ec on c.id_edo_caso = ec.id_edo_caso 
            inner join public.caso_sub_categoria d on d.id_caso_sub_categoria = c.id_caso_subcateg
        where 
            ec.id_edo_caso in (7)
            GROUP BY ec.tx_nom_edo_caso, servicio;

SELECT count(a.id)
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
where b.id_resolutorio in (503)
and b.principal is true
and a.id_estatus in (3,4,8)

SELECT count(a.id)
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
where b.id_resolutorio in (503)
and b.principal is true
and a.id_estatus in (6)
and a.verificado is null 
and (a.feedback < 2 or a.feedback is null)

SELECT count(a.id)
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
where b.id_resolutorio in (503)
and b.principal is true
and a.id_estatus in (6)
and (a.feedback >= 3   or  a.verificado = 'SI')

SELECT trunc(count(a.id)::Decimal * 100 / (SELECT count(a.id)
                                           FROM gestion.caso a
                                           inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
                                           where b.id_resolutorio in (503)
                                           and b.principal is true
                                           and a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,8))::Decimal, 2) as porcentaje
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
where b.id_resolutorio in (503)
and b.principal is true
and a.id_estatus in (6)
and (a.feedback >= 2   or  a.verificado = 'SI')

--Total de Casos por Fecha
select to_char(a.fecha, 'dd-mm-YY') as fecham, to_char(a.fecha, 'mm-dd') as fechaa, count(a.fecha) as total
    	from gestion.caso a 
    		inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso = a.id
    	 	inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio
	where a.fecha > CAST(now()::timestamp AS DATE) - CAST('15 days' AS INTERVAL) --and c.id_sub_categoria in (1)
	  and b.id_resolutorio in (503) 
		and a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,8)
        group by fecham , fechaa
        order by fechaa

panels.title: HISTÓRICO DE CASOS RECIBIDO EN EL SISTEMA DESDE LA VENAPP (ÚLTIMOS DÍAS)

targets.rawSql:
-- Total de Casos por Estado
select 
	b.nombre as estado, count(a.id) as total
    from gestion.caso a
	 inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado 
	 inner join gestion.responsable d on d.id_caso = a.id
	 inner join gestion.resolutorio e on e.id = d.id_resolutorio
	 where  d.id_resolutorio in (503) 
	 and a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,8)
    group by estado
    order by total desc
    Limit 10;

panels.title: ESTADOS CON MAYOR NUMERO DE CASOS EN EL SISTEMA

targets.rawSql:
-- Total de Casos por Estado
select 
	b.nombre as estado, count(a.id) as total
    from gestion.caso a
	 inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado  
	 inner join gestion.responsable d on d.id_caso = a.id
	 inner join gestion.resolutorio e on e.id = d.id_resolutorio
	 where  d.id_resolutorio in (503) 
	 and a.id_estatus in (6)
    group by estado
    order by total desc
    Limit 10;

panels.title: ESTADOS CON MAYOR NUMERO DE CASOS ATENDIDOS
REPORTE GENERAL DE LOS CASOS DE PDVSA GAS

targets.rawSql:
select count(a.id) as TOTAL
	from gestion.caso a
	  inner join gestion.responsable c on c.id_caso = a.id
	  where a.id_sub_categoria in (4) 
	        and a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,8)
		      and c.id_resolutorio in (503)

select count(*) as TOTAL
                from gestion.caso a
				inner join gestion.responsable d on d.id_caso = a.id
            where a.id_sub_categoria in (4) and 
                a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,8)
				        and a.id_extra_categoria is not null
				        and d.id_resolutorio in (503)

select count(*) as TOTAL
      from gestion.caso a 
					inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso = a.id
      where a.id_sub_categoria in (4) and 
            a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,8) and a.id_extra_categoria is null
				    and b.id_resolutorio in (503)

SELECT case when m.name is null then c.name else m.name end as sub_categoria, COUNT(a.id) as total 
	         FROM gestion.caso a 
                inner join gestion.category c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria 
				        inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso = a.id
                LEFT JOIN  gestion.category m ON m.id = a.id_extra_categoria   
            where a.id_sub_categoria in (4) and 
			   a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,8) 
			   and b.id_resolutorio in (503)
            GROUP BY sub_categoria
            ORDER BY total desc;

SELECT i.nombre as estatus, count(a.id) as subtotal,
            (SELECT count(a.id) FROM gestion.caso a
    					inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
    					inner join lista.ubch z on z.cedula = e.cedula 
    					inner JOIN  gestion.estatus i ON a.id_estatus = i.id
    			 		inner join gestion.responsable c on c.id_caso = a.id
    					where a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,8) --and a.id_sub_categoria in (7)
    					and c.id_resolutorio in (503))::Text "Total"
      FROM gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
            inner join lista.ubch z on z.cedula = e.cedula 
            inner JOIN  gestion.estatus i ON a.id_estatus = i.id
			      inner join gestion.responsable c on c.id_caso = a.id
         where a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,8) --and a.id_sub_categoria in (7)
		 and c.id_resolutorio in (503)
         group by estatus

SELECT count(a.id) FROM gestion.caso a
					inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
					inner join lista.ubch z on z.cedula = e.cedula 
					inner JOIN  gestion.estatus i ON a.id_estatus = i.id
			 		inner join gestion.responsable c on c.id_caso = a.id
					where a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,8) --and a.id_sub_categoria in (1)
					and c.id_resolutorio in (503)

-- Casos Recibidos
        SELECT count(a.id) FROM gestion.caso a
					inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
					inner join lista.ubch z on z.cedula = e.cedula
					inner JOIN  gestion.estatus i ON a.id_estatus = i.id
			 		inner join gestion.responsable c on c.id_caso = a.id
					where a.id_estatus in (3,4,8) --and a.id_sub_categoria in (1)
					and c.id_resolutorio in (503)

SELECT count(a.id) FROM gestion.caso a
					inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
					inner join lista.ubch z on z.cedula = e.cedula
					inner JOIN  gestion.estatus i ON a.id_estatus = i.id
			 		inner join gestion.responsable c on c.id_caso = a.id
					where a.id_estatus in (6) --and a.id_sub_categoria in (1)
					and c.id_resolutorio in (503)

-- Casos Cerrados
 select 
          ec.tx_nom_edo_caso::Text estatus,
          d.tx_nom_sub_categoria::Text servicio,
          count(c.id_caso)::Text subtotal,
          (select count(*) from caso where id_edo_caso in (7))::Text Total
        from 
            caso c 
            inner join edo_caso ec on c.id_edo_caso = ec.id_edo_caso 
            inner join public.caso_sub_categoria d on d.id_caso_sub_categoria = c.id_caso_subcateg
        where 
            ec.id_edo_caso in (7)
            GROUP BY ec.tx_nom_edo_caso, servicio;

SELECT case when m.name is null then c.name else m.name end as sub_categoria, COUNT(a.id) as total 
	         FROM gestion.caso a 
                inner join gestion.category c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria  
                inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
                inner join lista.ubch z on z.cedula = e.cedula 
				inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso = a.id
                LEFT JOIN  gestion.category m ON m.id = a.id_extra_categoria               
            where a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,8)
			and b.id_resolutorio in (503)
            GROUP BY sub_categoria
            ORDER BY total desc;

SELECT case when m.name is null then c.name else m.name end as sub_categoria, COUNT(a.id) as total 
	         FROM gestion.caso a 
                inner join gestion.category c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria 
                inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
                inner join lista.ubch z on z.cedula = e.cedula
				inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso = a.id
                LEFT JOIN  gestion.category m ON m.id = a.id_extra_categoria               
            where a.id_estatus in (6)
			and b.id_resolutorio in (503)
            GROUP BY sub_categoria
            ORDER BY total desc;

select b.nombre as estado, count(a.id) as total
  from gestion.caso a
	          inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
            inner join lista.ubch z on z.cedula = e.cedula
			      inner join gestion.responsable c on c.id_caso = a.id
	 where  a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,8) --and a.id_sub_categoria in (1)
			and c.id_resolutorio in (503)
            group by estado order by total desc Limit 10;

select b.nombre as estado, count(a.id) as total
  from gestion.caso a
	          inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
            inner join lista.ubch z on z.cedula = e.cedula
			      inner join gestion.responsable c on c.id_caso = a.id
	 where  a.id_estatus in (6) --and a.id_sub_categoria in (1)
			and c.id_resolutorio in (503)
            group by estado order by total desc Limit 10;

panels.title: REPORTE GENERAL CASO DE PDVSA GAS DE UBCH EN EL SISTEMA

targets.rawSql:
SELECT DISTINCT ON (a.nombre) a.nombre::Text "CODIGO CASO", 
      --a.codigo::Text "CODIGO CASO",
      e.cedula::Text "CEDULA", e.nombre::TEXT "DENUNCIANTE",
			e.telefono::Text "TELEFONO", b.nombre::Text "ESTADO", c.nombre::Text "MUNICIPIO", d.nombre::Text "PARROQ", a.descripcion::TEXT "DESCRIP", 
			f.name::Text "CATEGORIA", g.name::Text "SUBCATEG",case when m.name is null then 'Sin ExtCateg' else m.name end::Text "EXTCATEG", 
            case when n.name is null then 'Sin Categ Adi' else n.name end::Text "CATEG ADI",
			i.nombre::Text "ESTATUS",
            case when k.nombre is null then 'Analizando' else k.nombre end::Text "INSTITUCION",
            case when w.username is null then 'Analizando' else (w.first_name || ' ' || w.last_name) end::Text "RESPONSABLE",
			w.phone::Text "TELF. RESP"
            FROM gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
            inner join gestion.parroquia d on d.id = a.id_parroquia
            inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
			      inner join lista.ubch z on z.cedula = e.cedula
            inner join gestion.category f on f.id = a.id_categoria
            inner join gestion.category g on g.id = a.id_sub_categoria
            inner JOIN gestion.estatus i ON a.id_estatus = i.id            
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id --and j.id_user is not null
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio 
            LEFT JOIN  public.user w ON w.id = j.id_user
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.category m ON m.id = a.id_extra_categoria
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.category n ON n.id = a.id_adicional_categoria
            where a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,8) --and a.id_sub_categoria in (7)
            and j.id_resolutorio in (503);

panels.title: LISTADO DE CASOS  DE LA BASE DE DATOS
LISTADO DE CASOS  DE PDVSA GAS DE LA BASE DE DATOS (UBCH)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT count(a.id)
	  FROM gestion.caso a 
    inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso = a.id
	  inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio
    where b.id_resolutorio in (503) 
	  --c.id_sub_categoria in (1)
    and a.id_estatus in (3,4,8)

panels.title: CASOS  EN PROCESO DE PDVSA GAS

targets.rawSql:
SELECT count(a.id)
	  FROM gestion.caso a 
	  inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso = a.id
	  inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio
    where b.id_resolutorio in (503) 
	  --c.id_sub_categoria in (1)
    and a.id_estatus in (6)

select 
	b.nombre as estado, count(a.id) as total
    from gestion.caso a
	 inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado 
	 inner join gestion.responsable d on d.id_caso = a.id
	 inner join gestion.resolutorio e on e.id = d.id_resolutorio
	 where  d.id_resolutorio in (503) 
	 and a.id_estatus in (3,4,8)
    group by estado
    order by total desc;

panels.title: CASOS EN PROCESO POR ENT. FEDERALES

targets.rawSql:
select 
	b.nombre as estado, count(a.id) as total
    from gestion.caso a
	 inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado  
	 inner join gestion.responsable d on d.id_caso = a.id
	 inner join gestion.resolutorio e on e.id = d.id_resolutorio
	 where  d.id_resolutorio in (503) 
	 and a.id_estatus in (6)
    group by estado
    order by total desc;

panels.title: REPORTE GENERAL DE PDVSA GAS POR ENTIDADES FEDERALES

targets.rawSql:
select 
            b.nombre::Text "ESTADO", 
            count(a.id) as TOTAL
            from gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado 
            inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
            inner join lista.ubch z on z.cedula = e.cedula
			inner join gestion.responsable c on c.id_caso = a.id
       	where  a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,8)
			and c.id_resolutorio in (503)
        group by b.nombre order by TOTAL desc

panels.title: TOTAL CASOS DE PDVSA GAS DE UBCH - ENT. FEDERALES (SERVICIOS PRIORIZADOS)

targets.rawSql:
select 
            b.nombre::Text "ESTADO", 
            count(a.id) as TOTAL
            from gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
            inner join lista.ubch z on z.cedula = e.cedula
			inner join gestion.responsable c on c.id_caso = a.id
       	where a.id_estatus in (6)
			and c.id_resolutorio in (503)
        group by b.nombre
        order by TOTAL desc

panels.title: TOTAL CASOS DE PDVSA GAS ATENDIDOS DE  UBCH - ENT. FEDERALES (SERVICIOS PRIORIZADOS)
REPORTE DE CASOS DE PDVSA GAS DE UBCH RECIBIDOS-ATENDIDOS (POR ENTIDADES  FEDERALES)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT count(a.id)
	  FROM gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio 
			inner join gestion.responsable e on e.id_caso = a.id
    where --a.id_sub_categoria in (7)and 
    a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,8) 
    and c.id in (22,21,142,148,167,172,190,195,236,265,269,315,327,31,43,67,94,113,121,122,335, 214,250,296)
	and e.id_resolutorio in (503)

panels.title: TOTAL CASOS DE PDVSA GAS POR MUN. CAPITALES

targets.rawSql:
SELECT count(a.id)
	  FROM gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
			inner join gestion.responsable e on e.id_caso = a.id
    where --a.id_sub_categoria in (7) and 
    a.id_estatus in (6) 
    and c.id in (22,21,142,148,167,172,190,195,236,265,269,315,327,31,43,67,94,113,121,122,335, 214,250,296)
	and e.id_resolutorio in (503)

panels.title: TOTAL CASOS ATENDIDOS  - PDVSA GAS (MUN. CAPITALES)

targets.rawSql:
select 
           (c.nombre || ' (' || b.nombre || ')')::Text "MUNICIPIO", 
            count(a.id) as TOTAL
            from gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio  
			inner join gestion.responsable e on e.id_caso = a.id
       where --a.id_sub_categoria in (1) and
       a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,8)
       and c.id in (22,21,142,148,167,172,190,195,236,265,269,315,327,31,43,67,94,113,121,122,335, 214,250,296)
	   and e.id_resolutorio in (503)
        group by c.nombre, b.nombre
        order by TOTAL desc

panels.title: CASOS DE PDVSA GAS POR MUN. CAPITALES

targets.rawSql:
select 
           (c.nombre || ' (' || b.nombre || ')')::Text "MUNICIPIO", 
            count(a.id) as TOTAL
            from gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
			inner join gestion.responsable e on e.id_caso = a.id
       where --a.id_sub_categoria in (1) and 
       a.id_estatus in (6)
       and c.id in (22,21,142,148,167,172,190,195,236,265,269,315,327,31,43,67,94,113,121,122,335, 214,250,296)
	   and e.id_resolutorio in (503)
        group by c.nombre, b.nombre
        order by TOTAL desc

panels.title: REPORTE DE CASOS DE PDVSA GAS RECIBIDOS-ATENDIDOS POR MUNICIPIOS(CAPITALES DE ENTIDADES FEDERALES )

targets.rawSql:
SELECT count(a.id)
	  FROM gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
			inner join gestion.responsable e on e.id_caso = a.id
    where --a.id_sub_categoria in (7) and 
    a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,8) 
    and c.id in (127,184,24,32,255,51,182,149,204,20,239,212,290,166) 
	and e.id_resolutorio in (503)

SELECT count(a.id)
	  FROM gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
			inner join gestion.responsable e on e.id_caso = a.id
    where --a.id_sub_categoria in (7) and 
    a.id_estatus in (6) 
    and c.id in (127,184,24,32,255,51,182,149,204,20,239,212,290,166) 
	and e.id_resolutorio in (503)

panels.title: TOTAL CASOS ATENDIDOS - PDVSA GAS  (CD. IMPORTANTE)

targets.rawSql:
select (c.nombre || ' (' || b.nombre || ')')::Text "MUNICIPIO", 
            count(a.id) as TOTAL
            from gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
			inner join gestion.responsable e on e.id_caso = a.id
     where --a.id_sub_categoria in (7) and 
        a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,8)
       and c.id in (127,184,24,32,255,51,182,149,204,20,239,212,290,166) 
	   and e.id_resolutorio in (503)
       group by c.nombre, b.nombre
        order by TOTAL desc

select (c.nombre || ' (' || b.nombre || ')')::Text "MUNICIPIO", 
            count(a.id) as TOTAL
            from gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
			inner join gestion.responsable e on e.id_caso = a.id
     where a.id_sub_categoria in (4) and a.id_estatus in (6)
      and c.id in (127,184,24,32,255,51,182,149,204,20,239,212,290,166) 
	   and e.id_resolutorio in (503)
       group by c.nombre, b.nombre
        order by TOTAL desc

panels.title: REPORTE DE CASOS DE PDVSA GAS RECIBIDOS-ATENDIDOS DE OTROS MUNICIPIOS  (CIUDADES IMPORTANTES)

targets.rawSql:
select (c.nombre || ' (' || b.nombre || ')')::Text "PARROQUIAS", 
            count(a.id) as TOTAL
            from gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.parroquia c on c.id = a.id_parroquia 
			inner join gestion.responsable e on e.id_caso = a.id
     where --a.id_sub_categoria in (7) and 
        a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,8)
	  		and e.id_resolutorio in (503)
       group by c.nombre, b.nombre
        order by TOTAL desc limit 50

select (c.nombre || ' (' || b.nombre || ')')::Text "PARROQUIAS", 
            count(a.id) as TOTAL
            from gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.parroquia c on c.id = a.id_parroquia 
			inner join gestion.responsable e on e.id_caso = a.id
     where --a.id_sub_categoria in (7) and 
        a.id_estatus in (6)
	  		and e.id_resolutorio in (503)
       group by c.nombre, b.nombre
        order by TOTAL desc limit 50

panels.title: REPORTE DE CASOS DE PDVSA GAS RECIBIDOS-ATENDIDOS  POR ENTIDADES PARROQUIALES (50 PRIMERAS PARROQUIAS)
